summary:
A Driveable Covered Wagon, with a built in Tent, the first TRUE mobile home in Skyrim.
Hit the road and never pay for a room at a tavern again,.
Sick of fast travel? want to take a slower pace in the game,
but need something to carry all your stuff, well this is the mod for you!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://spacemonkeysinc.weebly.com/uploads/3/7/2/7/37272609/3555424_orig.png[/img]



[size=3][b][size=3][b][font=Impact][i][size=5]   -PRESENTS-[/size][/i][/font][/b][/size][/b][/size]


[img]http://spacemonkeysinc.weebly.com/uploads/3/7/2/7/37272609/839884_orig.png[/img]


[size=3][b][size=3][b][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=5]A Driveable Covered Wagon, with a built in Tent, the first TRUE mobile home in Skyrim.[/size][/b][/font][/b][/size][/b][/size]


[b]
[size=3][size=3][b][size=3][b]Hit the road and never pay for a room at a tavern again,. [/b][/size][/b][/size][/size]
[size=3][size=3][b][size=3][b]Sick of fast travel? want to take a slower pace in the game, [/b][/size][/b][/size][/size]
[size=3][size=3][b][size=3][b]but need something to carry all your stuff, well this is the mod for you!  [/b][/size][/b][/size][/size][/b]


[size=3][b][size=3][b][font=Comic Sans MS][img]http://spacemonkeysinc.weebly.com/uploads/3/7/2/7/37272609/_9358082_orig.jpg[/img][/font][/b][/size][/b][/size]


[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=5]Bring your friends along![/size][/b][/font][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]


[size=3][b][size=3][b][img]http://spacemonkeysinc.weebly.com/uploads/3/7/2/7/37272609/1371040_orig.jpeg[/img][/b][/size][/b][/size]




[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=5]Carry all your loot![/size][/b][/font][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[img]http://spacemonkeysinc.weebly.com/uploads/3/7/2/7/37272609/9323809_orig.jpg[/img]



[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=5]It's a mobile home! Set up a tent! (interior worldspace) [/size][/b][/font][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]





[size=3][b][size=3][b][img]http://spacemonkeysinc.weebly.com/uploads/3/7/2/7/37272609/6738503_orig.png[/img][/b][/size][/b][/size]

[size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b]Travel to Exotic Lands![/b][/font][/size]


[img]http://spacemonkeysinc.weebly.com/uploads/3/7/2/7/37272609/8664989_orig.jpeg[/img]


[size=3][b][size=3][b][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=5]Always know where your wagon is! (uses a quest tracker marker)[/size][/b][/font][/b][/size][/b][/size]



[size=3][b][size=3][b][font=Comic Sans MS][img]http://spacemonkeysinc.weebly.com/uploads/3/7/2/7/37272609/5774803_orig.jpg[/img][/font][/b][/size][/b][/size]






[size=3][b][size=3][b][font=Comic Sans MS][img]http://spacemonkeysinc.weebly.com/uploads/3/7/2/7/37272609/5492744_orig.jpg[/img][/font][/b][/size][/b][/size]



[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=5]Originally conceived as SRM Companion Cart by Supernastypants, he graciously gave me permission to re-issue and re-imagine his amazing mod. [/size][/b][/font][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=5]The big differences are that my horse and cart are not CRAZY like his where.[/size][/b][/font][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5]I have added a covered wagon and stuff to the back of the cart. [/size][/font][/b][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=5]The cart is now a mobile home! there is a built in tent.[/size][/b][/font][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5]I have slowed the speed of the horse/cart, much less bumpy and less prone to "flip-out" [/size][/font][/b][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]


[size=3][b][size=3][b][img]http://spacemonkeysinc.weebly.com/uploads/3/7/2/7/37272609/3856961_orig.png[/img][/b][/size][/b][/size]


[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b]Find the Khajit named J'zzir (fully voiced by Supernastypants) near the Pelagia Farm on the road near Whiterun (see description page map)[/b][/font][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b]Make sure you have 20,000 Septims on you or you will NOT get the dialogue to buy. [/b][/font][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]



[b][b][b][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=3]Once you have purchased the Travelers Covered Wagon, simply click on the cart and a dialogue box will appear, click the "More" selection and then click "Set up Tent" once in the tent [/size][color=#cc3333]Save and then load that save[/color][size=3], then exit the tent you will now be able to use the "Jump in" selection to drive the cart.[/size]

[size=4]New in Version 2.1 Compatibility with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57239/?]Simple Taxes Mod[/url] 
[/size][/b][/font][/b][/b][/b]
[size=4]Read J'Ziirs Note that is in your inventory and this will add a "Horses Owned" stat to the game, and this is used by Simple Taxes to apply taxes. [/size][/center]
[center]


[b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS]NEW in version 2.0 -Tether Cart!, 

You now can tether the cart using the cart menu. The best way to use is to Jump In cart,start to drive if horse walks away and cart does not move, Open Cart Menu (press E or default controller button A) and select Tether Cart, horse and cart should reset. The best way to still reset horse and cart is to enter the tent and exit, this feature is an alternate way but may cause Havok issues.

DO NOT SPAM THIS FEATURE OR WILL TURN THE CART INTO A KITE! 



NEW in Version 2.0 - Relocate Cart!



If you are a long way from your cart, you can now pay to have it brought to you for 500 gold! This new service is available in any worldspace, including Solstheim(Dragonborn DLC), Falskaar, Wyrmstooth, Elsweyr (Moonpaths to Elsweyr) This does not require ANY DLC or mods but can be used with them. 



Select the cart menu, then "More" then "Add Relocate Spell" this will add the relocate spell to your Shouts/Lesser Powers magic menu. 



Once horse is moved to the player, you may need to use Tether Horse, or enter and exit the tent, (I always save in the tent in new locations you should too)



NEW in Version 2.0 -Cart Bell power! (lesser power/shout key) 



A fun little Bell sound that is only active when you are driving the cart to warn pedestrians of your crazy cart driving.



[/font][/size][/b]

[size=3][b][size=3][b][img]http://spacemonkeysinc.weebly.com/uploads/3/7/2/7/37272609/7634268_orig.png[/img][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b]This mod should be compatible with everything*, including all horse mods, as it does not use the horse tracking in the default game.[/b][/font][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]




[size=3][b][size=3][b][img]http://spacemonkeysinc.weebly.com/uploads/3/7/2/7/37272609/_1346678_orig.png[/img][/b][/size][/b][/size]




[size=3][b][size=3][b][img]http://spacemonkeysinc.weebly.com/uploads/3/7/2/7/37272609/2400629_orig.png[/img][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][b][size=6][font=Comic Sans MS][s][color=#ff3333]Cart and Horse will separate![/color][/s] [color=#ff3333]<issue addressed in Ver 2.0>[/color][/font][/size][/b][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS]You MUST use the Cart Tent (Set up Tent dialogue) save then load that save [/font][/size][/b][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS]then exit the tent. The horse and cart WILL separate if you load a save in front of them. This must be done each time you want to drive the cart. (this works with any interior location also)[/font][/size][/b][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][b][color=#ff3333][size=6][font=Comic Sans MS]Cart is Bouncy[/font][/size][/color][/b][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS]The cart will bounce around quite a bit(this is why I slowed it down) [/font][/size][/b][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS]Followers entering the cart will make it freak-out for a moment but it will settle down, if it does not, enter the tent, save then load that save, exit the tent and it will reset itself. [/font][/size][/b][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS]I have not tested this with more than 2 followers as they will clip through the crates and barrels in the back. [/font][/size][/b][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]




[size=3][b][size=3][b][img]http://spacemonkeysinc.weebly.com/uploads/3/7/2/7/37272609/3584066_orig.png[/img][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[b][size=3][size=3][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b]Version 2.0 released on 8/8/2014[/b][/font][/size][/b][/size][/size][/b]

[b][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff3333]NEW[/color] in version 2.0 -Tether Cart!, 
You now can tether the cart using the cart menu. The best way to use is to Jump In cart,start to drive if horse walks away and cart does not move, Open Cart Menu (press E or default controller button A) and select Tether Cart, horse and cart should reset. The best way to still reset horse and cart is to enter the tent and exit, this feature is an alternate way but may cause Havok issues.

DO NOT SPAM THIS FEATURE OR WILL TURN THE CART INTO A KITE! 
[color=#ff3333]NEW[/color] in Version 2.0 - Relocate Cart!
If you are a long way from your cart, you can now pay to have it brought to you for 500 gold! This new service is available in any worldspace, including Solstheim(Dragonborn DLC), Falskaar, Wyrmstooth, Elsweyr (Moonpaths to Elsweyr) This does not require ANY DLC or mods but can be used with them. 

Select the cart menu, then "More" then "Add Relocate Spell" this will add the relocate spell to your Shouts/Lesser Powers magic menu. Once horse is moved to the player, you may need to use Tether Horse, or enter and exit the tent, (I always save in the tent in new locations you should too)

[color=#ff3333]NEW[/color] in Version 2.0 -Cart Bell power! (lesser power/shout key) 
A fun little Bell sound that is only active when you are driving the cart to warn pedestrians of your crazy cart driving.[/font][/size][/b][/center]
[center][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b][color=#ff3333]Fixed[/color] - changed 6000 Septims to 20000 Septims in J'Ziir dialogue 
[/b][/font][/size]
[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b]Version 1.1 released on 7/30/2014[/b][/font][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][color=#ff3333]Fixed:[/color] Incorrect name for tent interior - now displays "Wagon Tent"[/b][/font][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][size=3][b][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff3333]Fixed:[/color] (mostly) Horse AI has "no combat" and "ignore combat" settings checked.[/font][/size][/b][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b](in testing horse will not auto-attack and run away, but will defend if close enough) Still sorting this one out, if any one has suggestion I will be very happy.[/b][/font][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][size=3][b][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff3333]Added:[/color] Mood Lighting! set the interior to farm(house)lighting, darker and long shadows to match lantern. [/font][/size][/b][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][color=#ff3333]Added:[/color] Heat source for Frostfall and Hypothermia mods. [/b][/font][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][color=#ff3333]Added:[/color] Lit Lantern for new Mood Lighting!* [/b][/font][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][color=#ff3333]Added:[/color] Non-Respawning Storage - 2 Barrels, 1 Sack, 1 backpack* all should be safe for long term. [/b][/font][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][color=#ff3333]Added:[/color] Clutter - 1 East Empire Co. crate, 2 rolled rugs*[/b][/font][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]

[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b]*Tried to emulate items that are seen in the back of Wagon.   [/b][/font][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]



[size=3][b][size=3][b][img]http://spacemonkeysinc.weebly.com/uploads/3/7/2/7/37272609/4983045_orig.png[/img][/b][/size][/b][/size]




[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49036/?]Immersive First Person[/url] [/b][/font][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b]This mod is a must have I feel, plus it works really well with the Wagon, as the camera can be a bit off[/b][/font][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]



[size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56319/?]Bordeceil Bank Mod[/url][/b][/font][/size]

[size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b]Ok for those who need to get a loan for the 20,000 septims this is the mod for you, plus the cart is parked right out front! I love any banking/economy mods and I love real estate buying mods, and mods that let you trade the heavy gold for paper, well this mod has all of it. Remember to pay back loan or bad things happen. [/b][/font][/size]



[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10573/?]Camping Kit of the Northern Ranger[/url][/b][/font][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b]Gives you a place anywhere tent, fireplace, chairs, cooking spit and more. [/b][/font][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]






[size=3][b][size=3][b][img]http://spacemonkeysinc.weebly.com/uploads/3/7/2/7/37272609/3643952_orig.png[/img][/b][/size][/b][/size][/center]



[center][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2544072/?]SuperNastyPants[/url]
[/font][/size][/b][size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS]The creator of the Original SRM Companion Cart, awesome modder and nice guy for letting me muck about with his mod. [/font][/size][/b][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]


[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25493/?]Xgrufijury[/url] [/font][/size][/b][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS]For giving me permission to use the mesh and textures for the Covered Wagon from his awesome mod DragonKiller Cart.[/font][/size][/b][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]



[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][url=http://www.darkfox127.co.uk/]Darkfox127[/url][/font][/size][/b][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]
[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS]For creating the tent scripts and fixing all my texture/mesh issues, and for always being there for me, he is my modding mentor.[/font][/size][/b][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size]



[size=3][b][size=3][b][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/39159/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Mr.Dave[/url][/font][/size][/b][/b][/size][/b][/size][/center]
[center][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6537900/?]Adipsycho[/url][/b][/font][/size][/center]
[center][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/7chriss1cross3pedraza]ChrissCross[/url]
[/b][/font][/size]
[size=3][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b]For Testing this mod in ways that might be considered obscene in some countries Thank You![/b][/font][/size][/b][/size]


[size=3][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b](here is your reward) [/b][/font][/size][/b][/size]


[size=3][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][b][youtube]MuNmJECj6hI[/youtube][/b][/font][/size][/b][/size]






[size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][b][size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=293278627]Steam Workshop Version[/url] [/font][/size][/b][/b][/size][/b][/size][/b][/size][/center]
author: Fall Hammer

files.name: Travelers Covered Wagon - BSA Version Ver 1.0
Travelers Covered Wagon - Loose Files Version 1.0
files.fileName: Travelers Covered Wagon - Loose Files Version-56390-1-0.7z

files.name: Travelers Covered Wagon - BSA Version 1.1
files.changelogHtml:
Version 1.1 released on 7/30/2014
Fixed: Incorrect name for tent interior - now displays "Wagon Tent"
Fixed: (mostly) Horse AI has "no combat" and "ignore combat" settings checked.
(in testing horse will not auto-attack and run away, but will defend if close enough) Still sorting this one out, if any one has suggestion I will be very happy.
Added: Mood Lighting! set the interior to farm(house)lighting, darker and long shadows to match lantern.
Added: Heat source for Frostfall and Hypothermia mods.
Added: Lit Lantern for new Mood Lighting!*
Added: Non-Respawning Storage - 2 Barrels, 1 Sack, 1 backpack* all should be safe for long term.
Added: Clutter - 1 East Empire Co. crate, 2 rolled rugs*


*Tried to emulate items that are seen in the back of Wagon.

Fixed: Incorrect name for tent interior - now displays "Wagon Tent"

(in testing horse will not auto-attack and run away, but will defend if close enough) Still sorting this one out, if any one has suggestion I will be very happy.

files.name: Travelers Covered Wagon - BSA Version 2.0
files.changelogHtml:
NEW in version 2.0 -Tether Cart!,

You now can tether the cart using the cart menu. The best way to use is to Jump In cart,start to drive if horse walks away and cart does not move, Open Cart Menu (press E or default controller button A) and select Tether Cart, horse and cart should reset. The best way to still reset horse and cart is to enter the tent and exit, this feature is an alternate way but may cause Havok issues.

DO NOT SPAM THIS FEATURE OR WILL TURN THE CART INTO A KITE!

NEW in Version 2.0 - Relocate Cart!
If you are a long way from your cart, you can now pay to have it brought to you for 500 gold! This new service is available in any worldspace, including Solstheim(Dragonborn DLC), Falskaar, Wyrmstooth, Elsweyr (Moonpaths to Elsweyr) This does not require ANY DLC or mods but can be used with them.
Select the cart menu, then "More" then "Add Relocate Spell" this will add the relocate spell to your Shouts/Lesser Powers magic menu.

Once horse is moved to the player, you may need to use Tether Horse, or enter and exit the tent, (I always save in the tent in new locations you should too)

NEW in Version 2.0 -Cart Bell power! (lesser power/shout key)

A fun little Bell sound that is only active when you are driving the cart to warn pedestrians of your crazy cart driving.

NEW in version 2.0 -Tether Cart!,

You now can tether the cart using the cart menu. The best way to use is to Jump In cart,start to drive if horse walks away and cart does not move, Open Cart Menu (press E or default controller button A) and select Tether Cart, horse and cart should reset. DO NOT SPAM THIS FEATURE OR WILL TURN THE CART INTO A KITE!

If you are a long way from your cart, you can now pay to have it brought to you for 500 gold! This new service is available in any worldspace, including Solstheim(Dragonborn DLC), Falskaar, Wyrmstooth, Elsweyr (Moonpaths to Elsweyr) This does not require ANY DLC or mods but can be used with them.
Select the cart menu, then "More" then "Add Relocate Spell" this will add the relocate spell to your Shouts/Lesser Powers magic menu.

Once horse is moved to the player, you may need to use Tether Horse, or enter and exit the tent, (I always save in the tent in new locations you should too)

NEW in Version 2.0 -Cart Bell power! (lesser power/shout key)

A fun little Bell sound that is only active when you are driving the cart to warn pedestrians of your crazy cart driving.

files.name: Travelers Covered Wagon - Loose Version 2.1
files.changelogHtml:
New in Version 2.1

added Simple Taxes Mod compatibility, read J'ziirs note that is in your inventory to add a "Horses Owned" stat, this enables the features for Simple Taxes

files.name: Travelers Covered Wagon - BSA Version 2.1
files.changelogHtml:
New in Version 2.1

added Simple Taxes Mod compatibility, read J'ziirs note that is in your inventory to add a "Horses Owned" stat, this enables the features for Simple Taxes
